entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 02:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 9:36 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:36 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:36 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
